long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Job++: The Ultimate Job Tech Stack Tracker

Tired of manually tracking the tech stack mentioned in job listings across multiple platforms? Job++ makes it easy to stay on top of the most in-demand technologies. With just a few clicks, you can select and save relevant text from job descriptions, and Job++ will automatically store and organize the data by link.

Visualize your data like never before! Job++ offers powerful features to help you analyze the tech stack trends:
- Sort by Link: Easily see which platforms and companies mention specific technologies.
- Charts and Graphs: Get a visual representation of the most frequently mentioned skills, helping you prioritize your learning and preparation.

Whether you're a developer looking to stay competitive or someone preparing for the next big career move, Job++ is your go-to tool for mastering the job market.
